00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_GRAPH_ISO
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_GRAPH_ISO
00022 
00023 #include "GraphIsomorphism/src/myFindIso.h"
00024 
00025 // The following class is based on 'findiso.h'
00026 
00027 template<typename VarArray>
00028 struct GraphIsoConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00029 {
00030   virtual string constraint_name()
00031   { return "GraphIso"; }
00032   
00033   typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00034   
00035   VarArray var_array;
00036   
00037   TupleList* tuples;
00038   
00039   myFindIso* findIso;
00040   
00041   GraphIsoConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _vars, TupleList* _tuples) : AbstractConstraint(_stateObj),
00042     var_array(_var_array), tuples(_tuples)
00043   { 
00044     vector<set<int> > graph;
00045     graph.resize(vars.size());
00046     
00047     if(tuples->tuple_size() != 2)
00048     {
00049       cerr << "Graph Isomorphism only accepts binary graphs!" << endl;
00050       abort();
00051     }
00052     
00053     for(int i = 0; i < tuples->tuple_size(); ++i)
00054     {
00055       int left = tuples[i][0];
00056       int right = tuples[i][0];
00057       CHECK(left >= 0 && left < vars.size());
00058       CHECK(right >= 0 && right < vars.size());
00059       graph[left].insert(right);
00060       graph[right].insert(left);
00061     }  
00062 
00063     // TODO : Build graphs.
00064     Graph g1 = new Graph(graph);
00065     Graph g2 = new Graph(graph);
00066     findIso = new myFindIso(g1, g2, 2);
00067   }
00068   
00069   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00070   {
00071     triggerCollection t;
00072     int array_size = var_array.size();
00073     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00074       t.push_back(make_trigger(var_array[i], Trigger(this, i), Assigned));
00075     return t;
00076   }
00077   
00078   virtual void propagate(int prop_val, DomainDelta)
00079   {
00080       
00081   }
00082   
00083   
00084   
00085   virtual void full_propagate()
00086   {
00087   
00088   }
00089     
00090     virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00091     {
00092       abort();
00093       return true;
00094     }
00095     
00096     virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00097     {
00098       vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00099       vars.reserve(var_array.size());
00100       for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00101         vars.push_back(var_array[i]);
00102       return vars;
00103     }
00104     
00105     
00106    // Getting a satisfying assignment here is too hard, we don't want to have to
00107    // build a matching.
00108    virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00109    {
00110      MAKE_STACK_BOX(c, DomainInt, var_array.size());
00111      abort();
00112    }
00113    
00114    
00115   };
00116 
00117 template <typename T>
00118 AbstractConstraint*
00119 BuildCT_GRAPH_ISO(StateObj* stateObj,const T& t1, ConstraintBlob& b)
00120 { return GACTableCon(stateObj, t1, b.tuples); }
00121 
00122 #endif
